CustomField.formula: ( IF(ISPICKVAL(Example_of_Being_Physically_Healthy__c, 'b. Playing basketball with friends'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Example_of_Being_Emotionally_Healthy__c, 'c. Sharing feelings of being happy or sad'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Type_2_Diabetes__c, 'b. That happens when the body has too much sugar and it canâ€™t be processed correctly.'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Most_Important_Drink__c, 'c. Water'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Ways_to_Prevent_Type_2_Diabetes__c, 'd. All of the above'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Fruits_and_Vegetables_per_Day__c , 'b. 5'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Minimum_Minutes_of_Physical_Activity__c, 'd. 60 minutes'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Number_of_Food_Groups__c, 'b. 5'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Processed_Foods_Found_in_Boxes__c, 'True'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(French_Fries_Come_From_an_Animal__c, 'False'), +1, +0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(An_Ad_Tells_People_About_a_Product__c, 'True'), +1, +0) + IF(AND( INCLUDES(Names_of_Food_Groups__c, 'a. Dairy'), INCLUDES(Names_of_Food_Groups__c, 'b. Protein'), INCLUDES(Names_of_Food_Groups__c, 'c. Vegetables'), INCLUDES(Names_of_Food_Groups__c, 'd. Fruits'), INCLUDES(Names_of_Food_Groups__c, 'f. Grains') ), +1, +0) + IF(AND( INCLUDES(Healthy_Ways_to_Handle_Stress__c, 'a. Go for a walk outside'), INCLUDES(Healthy_Ways_to_Handle_Stress__c, 'b. Talk to a trusted friend or adult'), INCLUDES(Healthy_Ways_to_Handle_Stress__c, 'd. Write in a journal') ), +1, +0) ) / 13
CustomField.label: Score
